name: setting_id
description: Unique identifier for the chat setting entry (UUID)

name: provider
description: LLM provider: OPENAI, ANTHROPIC, GEMINI, DEEPSEEK

name: model_id
description: LLM model identifier (e.g., gpt-4o, claude-opus-4, gemini-2.0-flash)

name: include_org_context
description: Whether to inject org metadata into system prompt (default true)

name: enable_memory
description: Whether to load conversation history (default true)

name: max_history_messages
description: Maximum messages to load per conversation (default 50)

name: system_prompt_extra
description: Optional custom instructions appended to system prompt

name: is_active
description: Only one active chat setting per org

name: configured_by
description: User ID who configured these settings

name: updated_at
description: When this setting was last updated
